Chimdi Chekwa ( amụrụ n'ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Ọktob afọ 1988) bụ onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ dịka American football cornerback
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Ohio State
Ndị Raiders debara ya na agba nke anọ na 2011 NFL Draft.
Dị ka onye okenye n'afọ 2010, College Football News na  FWAA  kpọrọ Chekwa dịka onye otu egwuregwu mbụ All-American.
Ndị Oakland Raiders debara Chekwa na agba nke anọ, nke 113 n'ozuzu, na 2011 NFL Draft.
Ndị New England Patriots bịanyere aka ya na ọtu ha n'ụbọchị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 2015
Ndị otu ahụ tọhapụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015.
Chekwa bịanyere aka ya ọzọ na Raiders n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2015.

N'ụbọchị atọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2016, a tọhapụrụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke ngwụsị ikpeazụ. Dolphins bịanyere aka ya ọzọ n'ụbọchị iri na otu nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016. Dolphins tọhapụrụ ya n'ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2016.
N'afọ 2016, Chekwa nwetara nzere Master of Business Administration na Mahadum nke Miami Business School.
